sentence.Network_en: He sets out the facts coolly and dispassionately.
sentence.Network_cn: 他冷静、客观地摆出了事实。

sentence.Network_en: A scientist should dispassionately study the forces at work.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家应该冷静地研究各种交互作用的力量.

sentence.Network_en: She listened dispassionately but with great interest to both arguments.
sentence.Network_cn: 她平心静气地听着,然而对双方的理由都极为注意.

list.abs: But Domenicali insists he is thinking dispassionately about what road to take ., 但是多梅尼力卡说自己正在冷静思考路在何方.

this demanding , artificial code is what gives engaged , passionate and all-too-fallible human beings the collective power to produce results that are dispassionate , objective and reliable .这要求人造的规范给这些忙碌的，热情而容易犯错的人类以集体的力量，而使的最后的结果是冷静客观及值得信赖的。

entry.tran: 不动感情的；不带偏见的
entry.def: Someone who is dispassionate is calm and reasonable, and not affected by emotions.

example.ex: We, as prosecutors, try to be dispassionate about the cases we bring...
example.tran: 作为检察官，我们对经手的案件会尽力做到不偏不倚。

example.ex: He spoke in the flat, dispassionate tone of a lecturer.
example.tran: 他以一个讲师般平板、不动感情的口吻说话。

sentences.sentence: "although he was looking at the other girl, he did so dispassionately"

auth_sentence.content: The information given to the patient has to be presented dispassionately and sensitively.
auth_sentence.res_content: The information given to the patient has to be presented dispassionately and sensitively.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The information given to the patient has to be presented dispassionately and sensitively.

auth_sentence.content: "We have to let the dust settle to dispassionately judge," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "We have to let the dust settle to dispassionately judge," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "We have to let the dust settle to dispassionately judge," he said.

auth_sentence.content: Unlike George W Bush and John McCain, they argued, Mr Obama will approach foreign policy questions dispassionately.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unlike George W Bush and John McCain, they argued, Mr Obama will approach foreign policy questions dispassionately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unlike George W Bush and John McCain, they argued, Mr Obama will approach foreign policy questions dispassionately.
